actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to make it clear that Federal payments may be made thereunder for the training of personnel who are preparing for employment with State or local social services agencies as well as for the training or retraining of individuals as already employed by such agencies.

summary.text: Provides under title XX (Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act that Federal payments may be made thereunder for the training of personnel who are preparing for employment with State or local social services agencies as well as for the training or retraining of individuals already employed by such agencies.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to make it clear that Federal payments may be made thereunder for the training of personnel who are preparing for employment with State or local social services agencies as well as for the training or retraining of individuals as already employed by such agencies.
